:py:mod:`pyslam.capture.CaptureGroup`
=====================================

.. py:module:: pyslam.capture.CaptureGroup


Module Contents
---------------

Classes
~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   pyslam.capture.CaptureGroup.CaptureGroup




.. py:class:: CaptureGroup(listOfCaptureUIDs)

   A group of capture object UIDs together. Just a type that wraps around a
   list.
